Package presentation

Class ProgramAreaPresentation

java.lang.Object
presentation.ProgramAreaPresentation
public class ProgramAreaPresentation
extends java.lang.Object
ProgramAreaPresentation is intended to be used as a part of a BlockAreaCanvas. ProgramAreaPresentation handles activities concerning the programArea.
Version:
4.0
Author:
Andreas Awouters Thomas Van Erum Dirk Vanbeveren Geert Wesemael

      public void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draw the blocks from the programArea on the given Graphics object
      Parameters:

    • getBlockAtPosition

      public PresentationBlock<?> getBlockAtPosition​(game_world.api.Vector position)
      Returns the presentationBlock from the programArea if the presentationBlock covers this position
      Parameters:
      position - | position to get the block from
      Returns:
      | presentationBlock at given position | null if no block exists at given position

    • snapBlock

      public Command snapBlock​(PresentationBlock<?> block)
      Tries to snap block to any block in the programarea. If the plug is close enough to a corresponding socket of another block in programArea, these blocks will snap and this function will return a Command that holds all the information to undo and redo this action.
      Parameters:
      block -
      Returns:
      Command that holds all the information to undo and redo this action.
